title: Bani Finds Her Something
description: In this, Mr. Carey-Infante's second novelette dealing with the very important issue of LGBTQ teen bullying, Bani Chamberlain takes the issue head-on. She makes the courageous decision to deal directly with her bully. Her goal is to find out why he does what he does to so many defenseless kids. What follows is a hair-raising tale, delving into the dark world of corrective rape, a ritual popular in South Africa. Now that Bani has found her something, will she be able to make the difference she cravesâ€”to make it better now?
author: Kevin A. Carey-Infante
